casebody.data:
Lawrence GRANT
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 19, 2018

The petitioner Lawrence Grant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 185 Conn.App. 904, 194 A.3d 15 (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA and MULLINS, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
